document_data.name: ''Potion of Plant Control''
document_data.mainbody: A '''''potion of plant control''''' was a [[potion]] capable of influencing plants.
document_data.Powers: The imbiber of these potions could influence plants, [[fungi]], [[mold]]s, and [[shambling mound]]s, causing them to perform any of their normal activities with the exception of any self-destructive behavior. The area of control for normal plants was a square with {{SI|20|ft}} sides.
document_data.Notable Owners: [[Fennis]], a [[winemaker genie]] in [[Zakhara]], carried several ''potions of clairaudience'' that he used to produce fabulous vintages.
